AllDecks.General:
Aggressive Mining combined with Daring Thief: Opponent then can no longer play lands - Master of Waves - Elite Arcanist with "Return permanent to owner's hand" instant
New Color Combos: Gr Rd Bu Rd Wh Bk Bu Rd Wh Bk Gr Bu Wh Bk Gr
Enhance existing descks: Mer-Ek Nightblade (Bk) Secret Plans (Gr Bu) Swarm of Bloodflies (Bk)
Elite Arcanist Deck (Rd Gr Bu) [Modern]: - Kiora's Follower - SpellHeart Chimera Hexproofing: - Alpha Authority - Mizzium Skin - Ranger's Guile - Silence - Ring of Evos Isle, Mask of Avacyn - Sheltering Word - Simic Charm - Swiftfoot Boots - WitchStalker - Tower Archers - Lumberknot - Prognostic Sphinx - Cloak and Dagger
Target Creature bonus: - Coordinated Assault (Targets 2) - Defiant Strike (Targets 1, Draw 1) - Gods Willing (Targets 1, Scry 1) - Magma Spray (Targets 1, 2 dmg + exile) - Lightning Strike - Magma Jet (Targets 1, 2 dmg + Scry 2) - Retraction Helix (Targets 1) - Titan's Strength (Scry 1) - Triton Tactics (Targets 2) - Warrior's Lesson (Targets 2) - Dissolve - Charm: Jeskai, Sultai, Temur - Trap Essence (Targets 1) Removal: - Lots of black cards - Utter End
